name: "Living" Ring
description:
A little copper pot for your finger....

This piece of audreylaine jewelry is handmade of repurposed copper from the scrapyard, with a sterling silver band. It has been finished with a heat patina and Renaissance wax, which is a semi-permanent seal. Any progression of color as you wear the piece is inherent to the copper.

The moss is reindeer moss, no longer alive but still soft and pliable. It is not fixed in, so you can remove it to wear your ring as a hollow form.

Specify ring size in note to seller box.

Please allow three weeks for fabrication and delivery of this item, as it is made to order. Thanks for looking!

name: Large Sea Creature Brooch - octopus or tigerfish
description:
Hand cut and fabricated from repurposed brass and copper, your choice of either the octopus or tigerfish brooches (this listing is for one piece only, please specify which one).

This piece is made to order. As such, expect slight variations in color and shape. Please allow 3 weeks for completion and delivery.

name: Organic Circles - Feather Necklace
description:
Slightly asymmetrical yet structured, tough but feminine...

Each link of this one of a kind necklace is hand fabricated from sterling silver. The feather is handcut from repurposed brass. It is about 17" long, but closes with a simple hook so can also be worn shorter. The entire piece is finished with a liver of sulphur patina and renaissance wax.

This piece is made to to order. Please allow 2-3 weeks for fabrication and delivery.

name: Serene Bird Cuff
description: Cast sterling bird rests on brass concentric circled cuff, will adjust to fit average sized wrist.
